actions.in_committee: House Committee on District of Columbia

official_title: A resolution disapproving the action of the District of Columbia Council approving the Legalized Lotteries, Daily Numbers Games, and Bingo and Raffles for Charitable Purposes Initiative of 1980.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of the House of Representatives of the approval, by the majority of the voters of the District of Columbia voting, of the legalized lotteries, daily numbers games, and bingo and raffles for charitable purposes initiative of 1980.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving the action of the District of Columbia Council approving the Legalized Lotteries, Daily Numbers Games, and Bingo and Raffles for Charitable Purposes Initiative of 1980.
